entity.name: Kuvam Bhardwaj
entity.description: I am a self-taught developer, I like satirical humour. I believe in low-level control and solid abstractions. As FOSSMeDaddy on Github, I intend to provide a rethinking of the current practices in developer tools and developer-focussed services.

projects.name: DBDaddy CLI [WIP, functional state]
projects.description: A simple database management CLI tool. I created this project with the intent of spreading the opinion that you don't always need an ORM, a lot of the times, a good library and a good database management tool will do the trick!

projects.name: Simple File Storage [WIP, very early non-functional state]
projects.description: A wrapper on top of your existing storage solution like S3, cloudflare R2 or even local disk. provides a simpler way to manage permission-based access file systems.

projects.name: Giga-Byte Cache [WIP, core functional state]
projects.description: A simple LRU in-memory cache on top of local disk. Think Redis, but LRU, on top disk and written in Zig.
